sentences.en: Hallelujah ! All authority has been given to HIM in heaven and earth.
sentences.cn: 哈利路亚! 天上地下所有的权柄都属乎基督.

sentences.en: Hallelujah ! Salvation, glory, and power belongs to God.
sentences.cn: 哈里路亚! 救赎, 荣光, 与神之力.

sentences.en: Hallelujah, we are the kingdom people!
sentences.cn: 阿利路亚, 我们是国度的子民.

sentences.en: In the skills of chatting , Phoenix and Hallelujah neck and neck.
sentences.cn: 论灌水的技术, 凤凰和哈里路亚不分上下.

sentences.en: King of Kings , and Lord of Lords Hallelujah!
Mary rowed your boat ashore Hallelujah.
sentences.cn: 玛丽划你的船靠岸,哈利路亚.

sentences.en: Michael rowed your boat ashore Hallelujah.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔划你的船靠岸,哈利路亚.

sentences.en: Some of you are thinking, Hallelujah!
sentences.cn: 当中有些人在想, 哈利路亚!

sentences.en: Susan rowed your boat ashore Hallelujah.
sentences.cn: 苏姗划你的船靠岸,哈利路亚.

sentences.en: The mighty voice of a great multitude in heaven crying, " Hallelujah! "
sentences.cn: 天上大众高声欢呼: “ 哈利路亚! ”

sentences.en: The real meaning of Christmas had been restored to us. Hallelujah!
sentences.cn: 我们再次体会到了圣诞的真正内涵. 哈利路亚!

sentences.en: Theannounces the King of Kings Hallelujah!
Tony rowed your boat ashore Hallelujah.
sentences.cn: 托尼划你的船靠岸,哈利路亚.

sentences.en: Will I sing'Hallelujah! '? Will I be able to speak at all?
sentences.cn: 我是否会唱出”哈雷路亚! ”? 在那时,我真的还可以说话 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: used to express thanks, joy, or praise to God
